definition: name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: I am writing on behalf of our a non-profit organization in San Francisco.
sentences.chinese: 我寫在我們在舊金山的非營利組織的名義。

sentences.english: The passenger carrying capacity of a tramcar is nominal figure listed in gazette schedules.
sentences.chinese: 電車的載客量是憲報刊登的名義上數字。

sentences.english: Object. Should stop immediately use the name of the 28th CSSA.
sentences.chinese: 反對，應該立即停止以28屆名義開展活動。

sentences.english: I wish you a pleasant trip on behalf of my company and in my own name.
sentences.chinese: 我代表公司並以我自己的名義祝你旅途愉快。

sentences.english: To demand more in the name of morals is pure cant.
sentences.chinese: 以道德的名義讓人們多交稅是虛僞的。

sentences.english: An imperial edict is a writ in the name of an emperor.
sentences.chinese: 詔書是以皇帝名義發佈指令的專用文書。

sentences.english: Vincent think that the company good name, the special bet return.
sentences.chinese: 文森認爲公司好的名義，把特殊賭了歸去。

sentences.english: What in the name of God is going on there?
sentences.chinese: 我們憑藉着上帝的名義將要去向何處？

sentences.english: In the name NGOs the whole country continues to be backward.
sentences.chinese: 在非政府組織的名義下，整個國家繼續落後。

sentences.english: A franchisor must not falsely borrow the name of Franchising and illegally engage in direct selling activities.
sentences.chinese: 特許人不得假借特許經營的名義，非法從事傳銷活動。

sentences.english: Why do humans mutilate the land under the guise of making improvements?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼人類假借改善的名義而毀壞土地呢？

sentences.english: No franchiser may undertake illegal pyramid selling activities in the name of franchising .
sentences.chinese: 特許人不得假借特許經營的名義，非法從事傳銷活動。

sentences.english: Therefore, in the name of religion protection, Dalai Lama instigated serfs to rebel CPC .
sentences.chinese: 達賴就以保教的名義煽動那些農奴反對中共。

sentences.english: Thus they were not independent companies, except in name.
sentences.chinese: 因此，除名義外，它們並非獨立的公司。

sentences.english: Atheists don't kill in the name of Atheism.
sentences.chinese: 無神論者不會以無神論的名義屠殺。

sentences.english: International transactions are done at nominal, not PPP, currency values.
sentences.chinese: 國際間貿易是以名義幣值進行的，而非PPP。

definition: one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
to act as/used erroneously for 作為|作为
to promise/to undertake to do something/commitment
